page.title: 12Provision of education.
page.content: There are no schools in the area. The nearest{primary}and{secondary schools are at Southwell and a school bus service is provided. Most children attend these schools, although some go to{private schools}of which there are several within reasonable distance. A few attend other local authority schools. There is a private{playgroup}for 3-5 year olds at Morton. {Further education}is available at Newark Technical College and at various colleges in Nottingham and Mansfield. Many of the local farming community receive training at {Brackenhurst Agricultural College, Southwell. The nearest{University}is Nottingham. Non-vocational evening classes on a wide choice of subjects are held in Southwell.
